Summary: witnessed while camping on a clear almost full moon lit night
trends: There has been one other sighting in Braidwood
There were no other sightings in Braidwood on or around June 2nd 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife informed me while her and my son were camping at braidwood ,il. outside by the campfire, they saw 2 white glowing, very bright objects. hover and then speed off very quickly. she has the pictures and a video on her phone. she can't send video because of it's length. this was a clear, no clouds, almost full moon lit night. she sent me the pictures to my phone. they are pretty amazing. i can't forward because i dont have internet on my phone, is there a cell number i can forward these to? she posted the video on facebook, i'm going to try to forward to you. this is not the first time these were seen by us out there. my daughter had a sighting last summer in this same area. i did not witness, but am contacting you because i'm home. and they are camping.
